verbose_text: Sphingomyelin is synthesized from ceramide in the Golgi bodies by the activity of sphingomyelin synthases and is then transported to the plasma membrane and lysosomes [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR].
evidence: Sphingomyelin is synthesized from ceramide in the Golgi bodies by the activity of sphingomyelin synthases and is then transported to the plasma membrane
